name: Talking English Teacher Party
description:
Party With the Crazy Talking English Teacher! In this game, play on a large board game map, whislt obtaining dabloons and monitors. Whoever has the most wins at the end of 9 turns. At the end of every turn, you play a minigame to either give you or take away rewards! 

You can have UNLIMITED Players in this Party Game. 

Team 1 Controls:

WASD, C

Team 2 Controls:

Arrow Keys, M
